metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0826 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libcameraservice in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 does not require use of the ICameraService::dump method for a camera service dump, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application that directly dumps, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 26265403.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0826` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

android - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-copyright - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-emulator - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-images - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-runtime - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Mingjian Zhou, Chiachih Wu, and Xuxian Jiang

criterions.comment: android package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20160307-0742-0ubuntu3').
